channel.title: [06Evoloution] Coders Wanted!
channel.description:
guys! I'm not a very experienced coder myself. But maybe one of you guys could help me code our remake! Our staff so far are:
Admins: Me *Site manager* *Co-Coder* *Hoster* Josh *Community Manager* *THIS COULD BE YOU* *LEAD CODER* THIS COULD BE YOU *CO-CODER*
Mods: Skylord *Head Mod*
So if anyone is a decent coder and can code things like ::char and tutorial island, doors etc. Just reply below like this!
Name:
Age (Optional):
Experience:
Skype:
I will choose someone that I think could do us a good job.
Thanks!
EDIT: This server is a 317 remake!

item.title: [06Evoloution] Coders Wanted!
item.dc:creator: @RebirthScape RebirthScape
item.description:
@RebirthScape wrote:

Well, I’ve edited some codes and stuff. Usually when I needed help I search tutorials and I learn from them…So, I’ll give it a shot. And if I’m not good, you can always demote me.

Name: Frans

Age (Optional): 15

Experience: I google a lot of tutorials for certain things, I know some things about moving objects, shops, or stuff like that. I know how to add spawn area, add where people spawn and so what. You can always hire me, you can always demote me.

Skype: Frans_Hanna

Read full topic
